info.description: This is the API for the A Eso Voy application.
info.title: A Eso Voy API

get.description: Responds with a list of all categories

post.description: Creates a new category with a name and a description

get.description: Responds with a single category with a given ID

delete.description: Deletes a category with a given ID

patch.description: Updates a category's name or description

get.description: Responds with a list of all products that belong to a given category
get.summary: Gets all products from a category

get.description:
Responds with a list of all clients. Can be filtered using a
full-text search query, and paginated using limit and offset.
get.summary: Gets all clients, or searches them

get.description: Responds with a single client with a given ID
Responds with a list of expenses, filtered by type or date

post.description: Creates a new expense with optional receipt image

get.description: Responds with a single expense
Responds with a list of all ingredients

post.description: Creates a new ingredient with a name

get.description: Responds with a single ingredient with a given ID

delete.description: Deletes an ingredient with a given ID

get.description: Responds with a list of generated invoices (Excel files), with pagination and date filter
Responds with a list of all local sales.

post.description: Creates a new sale, validates stock, and adjusts it transactionally.

404.description: Resource not found (e.g., product, payment method)

get.description: Retrieves the details of a single local sale by its ID.
Responds with a list of all local stock records

post.description: Creates the first stock record for a product. Fails if a record already exists.
post.summary: Create initial stock for a product

get.description: Responds with the local stock quantity for a given product ID
get.summary: Get stock for a single product

patch.description: Adjusts a product's stock quantity by a delta (can be positive or negative).

get.description: Responds with a list of orders, with optional filters

post.description: Creates a new order for a client with a list of items

get.description: Responds with a single order with a given ID

patch.description: Updates the state of an order (e.g., "todo", "done", "delivered")

get.description: Responds with a list of all payment methods
Responds with a single payment method with a given ID

delete.description: Deletes a payment method with a given ID

get.description: Responds with a list of all products

post.description: Creates a new product with a name, a description, a category, and prices

get.description: Responds with a single product with a given ID

delete.description: Deletes a product with a given ID

post.description: Adds a new ingredient to a product's recipe
post.summary: Adds an ingredient to a product

delete.description: Removes an ingredient from a product's recipe
delete.summary: Removes an ingredient from a product

patch.description: Updates an ingredient's quantity or unit in a product's recipe

get.description:
Responds with a list of all providers. Can be filtered using a
full-text search query, and paginated using limit and offset.
get.summary: Gets all providers, or searches them

get.description: Responds with a single provider with a given ID

post.description: Creates a new authentication token for a user
Creates a new user with a username, email, and password

amount.description: stored as NUMERIC, transferred as string

BearerAuth.description: "Type 'Bearer' followed by a space and then your token."
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
